<h4><a href="//www.chinaz.com/news/mt/2019/0520/1017341.shtml">äºéè·â2019ç¾å¥½çæ´»æ°ç©ç§âå¹´åº¦å¤§å¥</a></h4>
<div class="other">
<span class="time" data-role="time">05æ20æ¥</span>
<span class="dot">Â·</span>

function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },

		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }

		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";

   var oDiv=document.getElementById("float");
   var H=0,iE6;
   var Y=oDiv;

var isLoading=false;
function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },
		function (msg) {
		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"tags\">";
		            str = str + "æ ç­¾ï¼";
		            if (data[i].tags != "") {
		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");

		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		            str = str + "</span></div></div>";
		        }

		        page++;
		        $(".catlist-more").html("å è½½æ´å¤");
		    }
		    else {

		});

var isLoading=false;
function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },
		function (msg) {
		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";

		            if (data[i].tags != "") {
		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");
		                for (var j = 0; j < tagArr.length; j++) {
		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		        }

		        page++;

(function(){

   var oDiv=document.getElementById("float");
   var H=0,iE6;
   var Y=oDiv;
   while(Y){H+=Y.offsetTop;Y=Y.offsetParent};
   iE6=window.ActiveXObject&&!window.XMLHttpRequest;
   if(!iE6){
       window.onscroll=function()
       {
           var s=document.body.scrollTop||document.documentElement.scrollTop;
           if(s>H){oDiv.className="div1 div2";if(iE6){oDiv.style.top=(s-H)+"px";}}
           else{oDiv.className="div1";}    
       };
   }

})();
</script>

            </ul>
        </dd>

function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },

		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";

		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";

		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"tags\">";
		            str = str + "æ ç­¾ï¼";
		            if (data[i].tags != "") {
		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");
		                for (var j = 0; j < tagArr.length; j++) {
		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		            str = str + "</span></div></div>";
		        }
		        $("#tagcontentlist > div:last").after(str);
		        page++;
		        $(".catlist-more").html("å è½½æ´å¤");
		    }
		    else {
		        $(".catlist-more").html("æ æ´å¤æ°æ®").unbind("click");
		    }
		    isLoading = false;
		});
    }
}
</script>
</head>
	<body>

function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");

		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";

       <ul>

(function(){

   var oDiv=document.getElementById("float");
   var H=0,iE6;
   var Y=oDiv;
   while(Y){H+=Y.offsetTop;Y=Y.offsetParent};
   iE6=window.ActiveXObject&&!window.XMLHttpRequest;
   if(!iE6){
       window.onscroll=function()
       {
           var s=document.body.scrollTop||document.documentElement.scrollTop;
           if(s>H){oDiv.className="div1 div2";if(iE6){oDiv.style.top=(s-H)+"px";}}
           else{oDiv.className="div1";}    
       };
   }

})();

		if(x.length > 0){
			for (i=0;i<x.length;i++){

		            str = str + "</span></div></div>";
		        }
		        $("#tagcontentlist > div:last").after(str);
		        page++;
		        $(".catlist-more").html("å è½½æ´å¤");
		    }
		    else {
		        $(".catlist-more").html("æ æ´å¤æ°æ®").unbind("click");
		    }
		    isLoading = false;
		});
    }
}
</script>
</head>

(function(){

   var oDiv=document.getElementById("float");
   var H=0,iE6;
   var Y=oDiv;
   while(Y){H+=Y.offsetTop;Y=Y.offsetParent};
   iE6=window.ActiveXObject&&!window.XMLHttpRequest;
   if(!iE6){
       window.onscroll=function()
       {
           var s=document.body.scrollTop||document.documentElement.scrollTop;
           if(s>H){oDiv.className="div1 div2";if(iE6){oDiv.style.top=(s-H)+"px";}}
           else{oDiv.className="div1";}    
       };
   }

var isLoading=false;
function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },
		function (msg) {
		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"tags\">";
		            str = str + "æ ç­¾ï¼";
		            if (data[i].tags != "") {
		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");

		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		            str = str + "</span></div></div>";
		        }

		        page++;
		        $(".catlist-more").html("å è½½æ´å¤");
		    }
		    else {

		});

   var oDiv=document.getElementById("float");
   var H=0,iE6;
   var Y=oDiv;
   while(Y){H+=Y.offsetTop;Y=Y.offsetParent};
   iE6=window.ActiveXObject&&!window.XMLHttpRequest;

       window.onscroll=function()
       {

		            if (data[i].tags != "") {
		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");
		                for (var j = 0; j < tagArr.length; j++) {
		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		            str = str + "</span></div></div>";
		        }
		        $("#tagcontentlist > div:last").after(str);
		        page++;
		        $(".catlist-more").html("å è½½æ´å¤");
		    }
		    else {
		        $(".catlist-more").html("æ æ´å¤æ°æ®").unbind("click");
		    }
		    isLoading = false;
		});
    }
}
</script>
</head>
	<body>

<script type="text/javascript">
$(function(){
    $('#readMore').click(function(){
        var page = $(this).attr('pid');
        var current = $(this).attr('current');
        if(current == 0){
        $(this).attr('current', 1);
        if(page!=0){
            $(this).find('span').show();
            $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/?app=article&controller=tags&action=more&tag=è¥éæ´»å¨&jsoncallback=?', '&page='+page,
                function(list){
                    if(list['list']){
                        $('.news_list').append(list['list']);
                        $('#readMore').attr('pid', parseInt(page)+1).attr('current', 0);
                        $('#readMore').find('span').hide();
                    }else{
                        $('#readMore').hide();
						$('#loadmore').html('æ²¡ææ´å¤äº');
                    }
                    
                }
            );
        }
        }
        return false;
    });
})

//ä¾§æ è·é
 $(window).scroll(function()
    {	
    	//newFixedBoxè·éæ»å¨
    	var h = $(window).height();
        var top = $(window).scrollTop();
    	var newFixedBox = $('.newFixedBox').prev().offset();
        var fixedTop = newFixedBox.top;
		
        if(top>=fixedTop+344)
        {
			var h1 = parseInt($('#content').children('.main').height());
			if(parseInt(top) + 340 < h1){
				$('.newFixedBox').css({'position':'fixed','top': 0});
			}else{
				$('.newFixedBox').css({'position':'absolute','top': h1-510});
			}
        }
        else
        {
            $('.newFixedBox').css({'position':'static', 'top':0});   
        }	
       /* return true;*/
    });
$(function(){
	$(window).on('scroll',function(){
		var st = $(document).scrollTop();
		if( st>0 ){
			if( $('#content').length != 0  ){
				var w = $(window).width(),mw = $('#content').width();
				if( (w-mw)/2 > 70 )
					$('#gotop').css({'left':(w-mw)/2+mw+20});
				else{
					$('#gotop').css({'left':'auto'});
				}
			}
			$('#gotop').fadeIn(function(){
				$(this).removeClass('hide');
			});
		}else{
			$('#gotop').fadeOut(function(){
				$(this).addClass('hide');
			});
		}	
	});
	$('#gotop .go').on('click',function(){
		$('html,body').animate({'scrollTop':0},500);
	});

	$('#gotop .cz-weixin').hover(function(){
		$('#gotop .cz-weixin-con').removeClass('hide');
	},function(){
		$('#gotop .cz-weixin-con').addClass('hide');
	});
});

</script>

var isLoading=false;
function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },
		function (msg) {
		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"tags\">";
		            str = str + "æ ç­¾ï¼";
		            if (data[i].tags != "") {
		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");
		                for (var j = 0; j < tagArr.length; j++) {
		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		            str = str + "</span></div></div>";
		        }
		        $("#tagcontentlist > div:last").after(str);
		        page++;
		        $(".catlist-more").html("å è½½æ´å¤");
		    }
		    else {
		        $(".catlist-more").html("æ æ´å¤æ°æ®").unbind("click");
		    }
		    isLoading = false;
		});
    }
}
</script>

   var oDiv=document.getElementById("float");

   var Y=oDiv;
   while(Y){H+=Y.offsetTop;Y=Y.offsetParent};
   iE6=window.ActiveXObject&&!window.XMLHttpRequest;

       window.onscroll=function()
       {
           var s=document.body.scrollTop||document.documentElement.scrollTop;

       };

    }
    var s = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
    s.parentNode.insertBefore(bp, s);
})();
(function(){
		var canonicalURL, curProtocol;
		//Get the <link> tag
		var x=document.getElementsByTagName("link");
		//Find the last canonical URL
		if(x.length > 0){
			for (i=0;i<x.length;i++){
				if(x[i].rel.toLowerCase() == 'canonical' && x[i].href){
					canonicalURL=x[i].href;
				}
			}
		}
		//Get protocol
	    if (!canonicalURL){
	    	curProtocol = window.location.protocol.split(':')[0];
	    }
	    else{
	    	curProtocol = canonicalURL.split(':')[0];
	    }
	    //Get current URL if the canonical URL does not exist
	    if (!canonicalURL) canonicalURL = window.location.href;
	    //Assign script content. Replace current URL with the canonical URL
    	!function(){var e=/([http|https]:\/\/[a-zA-Z0-9\_\.]+\.baidu\.com)/gi,r=canonicalURL,t=document.referrer;if(!e.test(r)){var n=(String(curProtocol).toLowerCase() === 'https')?"https://sp0.baidu.com/9_Q4simg2RQJ8t7jm9iCKT-xh_/s.gif":"//api.share.baidu.com/s.gif";t?(n+="?r="+encodeURIComponent(document.referrer),r&&(n+="&l="+r)):r&&(n+="?l="+r);var i=new Image;i.src=n}}(window);})();
var page = 2;
var isLoading=false;
function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },
		function (msg) {
		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"tags\">";
		            str = str + "æ ç­¾ï¼";
		            if (data[i].tags != "") {
		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");
		                for (var j = 0; j < tagArr.length; j++) {
		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		            str = str + "</span></div></div>";
		        }
		        $("#tagcontentlist > div:last").after(str);
		        page++;
		        $(".catlist-more").html("å è½½æ´å¤");
		    }
		    else {
		        $(".catlist-more").html("æ æ´å¤æ°æ®").unbind("click");
		    }
		    isLoading = false;
		});
    }
}
</script>

   var oDiv=document.getElementById("float");
   var H=0,iE6;
   var Y=oDiv;
   while(Y){H+=Y.offsetTop;Y=Y.offsetParent};
   iE6=window.ActiveXObject&&!window.XMLHttpRequest;
   if(!iE6){
       window.onscroll=function()
       {
           var s=document.body.scrollTop||document.documentElement.scrollTop;
           if(s>H){oDiv.className="div1 div2";if(iE6){oDiv.style.top=(s-H)+"px";}}
           else{oDiv.className="div1";}    
       };

<script>
var _hmt = _hmt || [];
(function() {
  var hm = document.createElement("script");
  hm.src = "//hm.baidu.com/hm.js?aecc9715b0f5d5f7f34fba48a3c511d6";
  var s = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]; 
  s.parentNode.insertBefore(hm, s);
})();
(function(){
    var bp = document.createElement('script');
    var curProtocol = window.location.protocol.split(':')[0];
    if (curProtocol === 'https') {
        bp.src = 'https://zz.bdstatic.com/linksubmit/push.js';
    }
    else {
        bp.src = 'http://push.zhanzhang.baidu.com/push.js';
    }
    var s = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
    s.parentNode.insertBefore(bp, s);
})();
(function(){
		var canonicalURL, curProtocol;
		//Get the <link> tag
		var x=document.getElementsByTagName("link");
		//Find the last canonical URL
		if(x.length > 0){
			for (i=0;i<x.length;i++){
				if(x[i].rel.toLowerCase() == 'canonical' && x[i].href){
					canonicalURL=x[i].href;
				}
			}
		}
		//Get protocol
	    if (!canonicalURL){
	    	curProtocol = window.location.protocol.split(':')[0];
	    }
	    else{
	    	curProtocol = canonicalURL.split(':')[0];
	    }
	    //Get current URL if the canonical URL does not exist
	    if (!canonicalURL) canonicalURL = window.location.href;
	    //Assign script content. Replace current URL with the canonical URL
    	!function(){var e=/([http|https]:\/\/[a-zA-Z0-9\_\.]+\.baidu\.com)/gi,r=canonicalURL,t=document.referrer;if(!e.test(r)){var n=(String(curProtocol).toLowerCase() === 'https')?"https://sp0.baidu.com/9_Q4simg2RQJ8t7jm9iCKT-xh_/s.gif":"//api.share.baidu.com/s.gif";t?(n+="?r="+encodeURIComponent(document.referrer),r&&(n+="&l="+r)):r&&(n+="?l="+r);var i=new Image;i.src=n}}(window);})();
var page = 2;
var isLoading=false;
function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },
		function (msg) {
		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"tags\">";
		            str = str + "æ ç­¾ï¼";
		            if (data[i].tags != "") {
		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");
		                for (var j = 0; j < tagArr.length; j++) {
		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		            str = str + "</span></div></div>";
		        }
		        $("#tagcontentlist > div:last").after(str);
		        page++;
		        $(".catlist-more").html("å è½½æ´å¤");
		    }
		    else {
		        $(".catlist-more").html("æ æ´å¤æ°æ®").unbind("click");
		    }
		    isLoading = false;
		});
    }
}
</script>

(function(){

   var oDiv=document.getElementById("float");
   var H=0,iE6;
   var Y=oDiv;
   while(Y){H+=Y.offsetTop;Y=Y.offsetParent};
   iE6=window.ActiveXObject&&!window.XMLHttpRequest;
   if(!iE6){
       window.onscroll=function()
       {
           var s=document.body.scrollTop||document.documentElement.scrollTop;
           if(s>H){oDiv.className="div1 div2";if(iE6){oDiv.style.top=(s-H)+"px";}}
           else{oDiv.className="div1";}    
       };
   }

})();

var isLoading=false;
function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },
		function (msg) {
		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"tags\">";
		            str = str + "æ ç­¾ï¼";
		            if (data[i].tags != "") {
		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");
		                for (var j = 0; j < tagArr.length; j++) {
		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		            str = str + "</span></div></div>";
		        }
		        $("#tagcontentlist > div:last").after(str);
		        page++;
		        $(".catlist-more").html("å è½½æ´å¤");
		    }
		    else {
		        $(".catlist-more").html("æ æ´å¤æ°æ®").unbind("click");
		    }
		    isLoading = false;
		});
    }
}

var isLoading=false;
function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },
		function (msg) {
		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"tags\">";

		            if (data[i].tags != "") {
		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");

		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		            str = str + "</span></div></div>";
		        }

		        page++;
		        $(".catlist-more").html("å è½½æ´å¤");

		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";

var isLoading=false;
function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },
		function (msg) {
		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";

		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");

		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		        }

   var oDiv=document.getElementById("float");
   var H=0,iE6;
   var Y=oDiv;
   while(Y){H+=Y.offsetTop;Y=Y.offsetParent};
   iE6=window.ActiveXObject&&!window.XMLHttpRequest;

       window.onscroll=function()
       {

var isLoading=false;
function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },
		function (msg) {
		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"tags\">";
		            str = str + "æ ç­¾ï¼";
		            if (data[i].tags != "") {
		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");
		                for (var j = 0; j < tagArr.length; j++) {
		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		            str = str + "</span></div></div>";
		        }
		        $("#tagcontentlist > div:last").after(str);
		        page++;
		        $(".catlist-more").html("å è½½æ´å¤");
		    }
		    else {

		    }

		});

var isLoading=false;
function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },
		function (msg) {
		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"tags\">";
		            str = str + "æ ç­¾ï¼";
		            if (data[i].tags != "") {
		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");

		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		            str = str + "</span></div></div>";
		        }

		        page++;
		        $(".catlist-more").html("å è½½æ´å¤");
		    }

		});

var isLoading=false;
function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },
		function (msg) {
		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"tags\">";
		            str = str + "æ ç­¾ï¼";
		            if (data[i].tags != "") {
		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");
		                for (var j = 0; j < tagArr.length; j++) {
		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		            str = str + "</span></div></div>";
		        }
		        $("#tagcontentlist > div:last").after(str);
		        page++;
		        $(".catlist-more").html("å è½½æ´å¤");
		    }

(function(){
    var bp = document.createElement('script');
    var curProtocol = window.location.protocol.split(':')[0];
    if (curProtocol === 'https') {
        bp.src = 'https://zz.bdstatic.com/linksubmit/push.js';
    }
    else {
        bp.src = 'http://push.zhanzhang.baidu.com/push.js';
    }
    var s = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
    s.parentNode.insertBefore(bp, s);
})();
(function(){
		var canonicalURL, curProtocol;
		//Get the <link> tag
		var x=document.getElementsByTagName("link");
		//Find the last canonical URL
		if(x.length > 0){
			for (i=0;i<x.length;i++){
				if(x[i].rel.toLowerCase() == 'canonical' && x[i].href){
					canonicalURL=x[i].href;
				}
			}
		}
		//Get protocol
	    if (!canonicalURL){
	    	curProtocol = window.location.protocol.split(':')[0];
	    }
	    else{
	    	curProtocol = canonicalURL.split(':')[0];
	    }
	    //Get current URL if the canonical URL does not exist
	    if (!canonicalURL) canonicalURL = window.location.href;
	    //Assign script content. Replace current URL with the canonical URL
    	!function(){var e=/([http|https]:\/\/[a-zA-Z0-9\_\.]+\.baidu\.com)/gi,r=canonicalURL,t=document.referrer;if(!e.test(r)){var n=(String(curProtocol).toLowerCase() === 'https')?"https://sp0.baidu.com/9_Q4simg2RQJ8t7jm9iCKT-xh_/s.gif":"//api.share.baidu.com/s.gif";t?(n+="?r="+encodeURIComponent(document.referrer),r&&(n+="&l="+r)):r&&(n+="?l="+r);var i=new Image;i.src=n}}(window);})();
var page = 2;
var isLoading=false;
function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },
		function (msg) {
		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"tags\">";
		            str = str + "æ ç­¾ï¼";
		            if (data[i].tags != "") {
		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");
		                for (var j = 0; j < tagArr.length; j++) {
		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		            str = str + "</span></div></div>";
		        }
		        $("#tagcontentlist > div:last").after(str);
		        page++;
		        $(".catlist-more").html("å è½½æ´å¤");
		    }
		    else {
		        $(".catlist-more").html("æ æ´å¤æ°æ®").unbind("click");
		    }
		    isLoading = false;
		});
    }
}
</script>

							<h3 class="title"><span>ç¼è¾æ¨è</span></h3>

function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },

		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";

var isLoading=false;
function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },
		function (msg) {
		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"tags\">";
		            str = str + "æ ç­¾ï¼";
		            if (data[i].tags != "") {
		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");
		                for (var j = 0; j < tagArr.length; j++) {
		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		            str = str + "</span></div></div>";
		        }
		        $("#tagcontentlist > div:last").after(str);
		        page++;
		        $(".catlist-more").html("å è½½æ´å¤");
		    }

		});

function loadMore(tagid) {

		var x=document.getElementsByTagName("link");
		//Find the last canonical URL
		if(x.length > 0){
			for (i=0;i<x.length;i++){
				if(x[i].rel.toLowerCase() == 'canonical' && x[i].href){
					canonicalURL=x[i].href;
				}
			}

	    if (!canonicalURL){

var isLoading=false;
function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },
		function (msg) {
		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"tags\">";
		            str = str + "æ ç­¾ï¼";
		            if (data[i].tags != "") {
		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");
		                for (var j = 0; j < tagArr.length; j++) {
		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		            str = str + "</span></div></div>";
		        }
		        $("#tagcontentlist > div:last").after(str);
		        page++;
		        $(".catlist-more").html("å è½½æ´å¤");
		    }
		    else {

		});

       window.onscroll=function()
       {
           var s=document.body.scrollTop||document.documentElement.scrollTop;
           if(s>H){oDiv.className="div1 div2";if(iE6){oDiv.style.top=(s-H)+"px";}}
           else{oDiv.className="div1";}    
       };
   }

})();
</script>

var isLoading=false;
function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },
		function (msg) {
		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";

		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");

		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }

(function(){

   var oDiv=document.getElementById("float");
   var H=0,iE6;
   var Y=oDiv;
   while(Y){H+=Y.offsetTop;Y=Y.offsetParent};
   iE6=window.ActiveXObject&&!window.XMLHttpRequest;
   if(!iE6){
       window.onscroll=function()
       {
           var s=document.body.scrollTop||document.documentElement.scrollTop;
           if(s>H){oDiv.className="div1 div2";if(iE6){oDiv.style.top=(s-H)+"px";}}
           else{oDiv.className="div1";}    
       };
   }

})();

var _hmt = _hmt || [];
(function() {
  var hm = document.createElement("script");
  hm.src = "//hm.baidu.com/hm.js?aecc9715b0f5d5f7f34fba48a3c511d6";
  var s = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]; 
  s.parentNode.insertBefore(hm, s);
})();
(function(){
    var bp = document.createElement('script');
    var curProtocol = window.location.protocol.split(':')[0];
    if (curProtocol === 'https') {
        bp.src = 'https://zz.bdstatic.com/linksubmit/push.js';
    }
    else {
        bp.src = 'http://push.zhanzhang.baidu.com/push.js';
    }
    var s = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
    s.parentNode.insertBefore(bp, s);
})();
(function(){
		var canonicalURL, curProtocol;
		//Get the <link> tag
		var x=document.getElementsByTagName("link");
		//Find the last canonical URL
		if(x.length > 0){
			for (i=0;i<x.length;i++){
				if(x[i].rel.toLowerCase() == 'canonical' && x[i].href){
					canonicalURL=x[i].href;
				}
			}
		}
		//Get protocol
	    if (!canonicalURL){
	    	curProtocol = window.location.protocol.split(':')[0];
	    }
	    else{
	    	curProtocol = canonicalURL.split(':')[0];
	    }
	    //Get current URL if the canonical URL does not exist
	    if (!canonicalURL) canonicalURL = window.location.href;
	    //Assign script content. Replace current URL with the canonical URL
    	!function(){var e=/([http|https]:\/\/[a-zA-Z0-9\_\.]+\.baidu\.com)/gi,r=canonicalURL,t=document.referrer;if(!e.test(r)){var n=(String(curProtocol).toLowerCase() === 'https')?"https://sp0.baidu.com/9_Q4simg2RQJ8t7jm9iCKT-xh_/s.gif":"//api.share.baidu.com/s.gif";t?(n+="?r="+encodeURIComponent(document.referrer),r&&(n+="&l="+r)):r&&(n+="?l="+r);var i=new Image;i.src=n}}(window);})();
var page = 2;
var isLoading=false;
function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },
		function (msg) {
		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"tags\">";
		            str = str + "æ ç­¾ï¼";
		            if (data[i].tags != "") {
		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");
		                for (var j = 0; j < tagArr.length; j++) {
		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		            str = str + "</span></div></div>";
		        }
		        $("#tagcontentlist > div:last").after(str);
		        page++;
		        $(".catlist-more").html("å è½½æ´å¤");
		    }
		    else {
		        $(".catlist-more").html("æ æ´å¤æ°æ®").unbind("click");
		    }
		    isLoading = false;
		});
    }
}
</script>

function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");

		function (msg) {
		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"dot\">Â·</span>";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"tags\">";

		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");

		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

		            str = str + "</span></div></div>";
		        }
		        $("#tagcontentlist > div:last").after(str);
		        page++;
		        $(".catlist-more").html("å è½½æ´å¤");
		    }
		    else {

		    }
		    isLoading = false;
		});
    }

function loadMore(tagid) {
    if (!isLoading)
    {
        isLoading = true;
        $(".catlist-more").html("<img src=\"/templates/2015style/images/icon/loadingMin.gif\">å è½½ä¸­....");
        $.getJSON('http://app.chinaz.com/ajax/TagMoreHandler.ashx?action=GetMoreTag&jsoncallback=?', { page: page, tagid: tagid },

		    if (msg.total > 0) {
		        var data = msg.data;
		        var str = "";
		        for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
		            if (data[i].thumb == '') {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix catlist-box-txt\">";
		            }
		            else {
		                str = str + "<div class=\"catlist-box clearfix\">";
		                str = str + "<div class=\"pic img-do f-fl\">";
		                str = str + "<a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">";
		                str = str + "<img alt=\"\" src=\"" + data[i].thumb + "\" onerror=\"this.src='//img.chinaz.com/templates/game/images/imgloading.gif'\">";
		                str = str + "</a></div>";
		            }
		            str = str + "<h4><a href=\"" + data[i].url + "\">" + data[i].title + "</a></h4>";
		            str = str + "<div class=\"other\">";
		            str = str + "<span class=\"time\" data-role=\"time\">" + crtTimeFtt(data[i].published, "yyyy-MM-dd") + "</span>";

		                var tagArr = data[i].tags.split(" ");

		                    str = str + "<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"/tags/" + codefans_net_CC2PY(tagArr[j]) + ".shtml\">" + tagArr[j] + "</a>";
		                }
		            }

    <h1>chinaz.com - 站长之家</h1>
    <h2><em>404 Error</em>: 抱歉, 您所查找的页面不存在, 可能已被删除或您输错了网址!</h2>
	<div  class="texts">
    <dl>
        <dt>没有发现你要找的页面, 经砖家仔细研究结果如下:</dt>
        <dd>
            <ul>
                <li>贵玉手输入地址时可能存在键入错误</li>
                <li>小蜗牛把页面落家里忘记带了</li>
                <li>电信网通那头接口生锈了</li>
            </ul>
        </dd>
    </dl>
	</div>
